TXT_KEY_TECH_SOLAR_POWER_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Solar Plant[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production if the City is near a desert.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SOLAR_POWER_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I have no doubt that we will be successful in harnessing the sun's energy... If sunbeams were weapons of war, we would have had solar energy centuries ago."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Sir George Porter
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMPOSITE_ARMOR_TITLE Composite Armor ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMPOSITE_ARMOR_DESC Composite armour is a type of vehicle armour consisting of layers of different material such as metals, plastics, ceramics or air. Most composite armour are lighter than their all-metal equivalent, but instead occupy a larger volume for the same resistance to penetration. It is possible to design composite armour stronger, lighter and less voluminous than traditional armour, but the cost is often prohibitively high, restricting its use to especially vulnerable parts of a vehicle. Its primary purpose is to help defeat high explosive anti-tank (HEAT) rounds.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]HEAT had posed a serious threat to armoured vehicles since its introduction in World War II. Lightweight and small, HEAT rounds could nevertheless penetrate hundreds of millimetres of the hardest steel armours. The capability of most materials for defeating HEAT follows the "density law", which states that the penetration of shaped charge jets is proportional to the square root of the shaped charge liner density (typically copper) divided by the square root of the target density. On a weight basis, lighter targets are more advantageous than heavier targets, but using large quantities of lightweight materials has obvious disadvantages in terms of mechanical layout. Certain materials have a sweet spot in terms of density that makes them particularly useful in this role.
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMPOSITE_ARMOR_HELP Allows you to build the powerful [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Modern Armor[ENDCOLOR] unit.
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMPOSITE_ARMOR_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Whereas knights of old wore armor of plate, the modern knights of the air wear the invisible but magic armor of confidence in technology"[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Mike Spick
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMBINED_ARMS_DOCTRINE_TITLE Combined Arms Doctrine ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMBINED_ARMS_DOCTRINE_DESC Combined arms is an approach to warfare which seeks to integrate different branches of a military to achieve mutually complementary effects (for example, using infantry and armor in an urban environment, where one supports the other, or both support each other). Combined arms doctrine contrasts with segregated arms where each military unit is composed of only one type of soldier or weapon system. Segregated arms is the traditional method of unit/force organisation, employed to provide maximum unit cohesion and concentration of force in a given weapon or unit type.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Though the lower-echelon units of a combined arms team may be of homogeneous types, a balanced mixture of such units are combined into an effective higher-echelon unit, whether formally in a table of organization or informally in an ad hoc solution to a battlefield problem. For example an armored division — the modern paragon of combined arms doctrine — consists of a mixture of infantry, tank, artillery, reconnaissance, and perhaps even helicopter units, all coordinated and directed by a unified command structure.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Also, most modern military units can if the situation requires it call on yet more branches of the military, such as fighter or bomber aircraft or naval forces, to support their operations. The mixing of arms is sometimes pushed down below the level where homogeneity ordinarily prevails, for example by temporarily attaching a tank company to an infantry battalion.
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMBINED_ARMS_DOCTRINE_HELP Allows you to build the powerful [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Combat Controller[ENDCOLOR] unit.
TXT_KEY_TECH_COMBINED_ARMS_DOCTRINE_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I were to sum up what I've learned in 35 years of service, it's improvise, improvise, improvise."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - General James Mattis
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOTECH_INDUSTRY BioTech Industry ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOTECH_INDUSTRY_DESC Biotechnology is a field of applied biology that involves the use of living organisms and bioprocesses in engineering, technology, medicine and other fields requiring bioproducts. Modern use similar term includes genetic engineering as well as cell- and tissue culture technologies. The concept encompasses a wide range of procedures (and history) for modifying living organisms according to human purposes - going back to domestication of animals, cultivation of plants, and "improvements" to these through breeding programs that employ artificial selection and hybridization.
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOTECH_INDUSTRY_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Biotech Industrial Park[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOTECH_INDUSTRY_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"We have the means right now to live long enough to live forever."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Ray Kurzweil
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_FLIGHT_TITLE Advanced Flight ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_FLIGHT_DESC Advanced flight pertains to concepts that go beyond simple aerodynamics, pushing the envelope for technical development. Jet turbine engines, vertical takeoff, hovering, supersonic speed, and more are all staples of this advanced technology.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_FLIGHT_HELP Allows training of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Jet Fighters[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Helicopter Gunships[ENDCOLOR], and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mobile SAMs[ENDCOLOR], and the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Airport[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_FLIGHT_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"You don't concentrate on risks. You concentrate on results. No risk is too great to prevent the necessary job from getting done."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Chuck Yeager
TXT_KEY_TECH_MANNED_SPACEFLIGHT_TITLE Manned Spaceflight ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_MANNED_SPACEFLIGHT_DESC Manned Spaceflight is the use of space technology to achieve the manned flight of spacecraft into and through outer space and the heavenly bodies.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MANNED_SPACEFLIGHT_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Apollo Program[ENDCOLOR], beginning the spacerace.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MANNED_SPACEFLIGHT_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Here men from the planet Earth first set foot upon the Moon. July 1969 AD. We came in peace for all mankind."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Neil Armstrong
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_ENGINEERING_TITLE Genetic Engineering ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_ENGINEERING_DESC Genetic engineering, also called genetic modification, is the human manipulation of an organism's genetic material in a way that does not occur under natural conditions. It involves the use of recombinant DNA techniques, but does not include traditional animal and plant breeding or mutagenesis. Any organism that is generated using these techniques is considered to be a genetically modified organism.
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_ENGINEERING_HELP Increases Farm yields. Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cure for Cancer[ENDCOLOR] wonder which greatly increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in all cities.
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_ENGINEERING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Natural species are the library from which genetic engineers can work."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Thomas E. Lovejoy
TXT_KEY_TECH_MOBILE_PHONES_TITLE Mobile Phones ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_MOBILE_PHONES_DESC A mobile phone (also called mobile, cellular phone, cell phone or handphone)[1] is an electronic device used for full duplex two-way radio telecommunications over a cellular network of base stations known as cell sites. Mobile phones differ from cordless telephones, which only offer telephone service within limited range through a single base station attached to a fixed land line, for example within a home or an office.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MOBILE_PHONES_HELP Increases Trading Post yield. Allows construction of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cell Towers[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MOBILE_PHONES_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"To be happy in this world, first you need a cell phone and then you need an airplane. Then you're truly wireless."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Ted Turner
TXT_KEY_TECH_INTERNET_TITLE Internet ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_INTERNET_DESC The Internet is a global system of interconnected computer networks that use the standard Internet Protocol Suite (TCP/IP) to serve billions of users worldwide. It is a network of networks that consists of millions of private, public, academic, business, and government networks, of local to global scope, that are linked by a broad array of electronic and optical networking technologies. The Internet carries a vast range of information resources and services, such as the inter-linked hypertext documents of the World Wide Web (WWW) and the infrastructure to support electronic mail.
TXT_KEY_TECH_INTERNET_HELP Increases Trading Post yield. Allows construction of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Server Farms[ENDCOLOR] which decrease the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of acquiring new tiles, and increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science generation. Also allows for construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Internet[ENDCOLOR] which increases empire [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] and grants 2 free Great Engineers.
TXT_KEY_TECH_INTERNET_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Bill Gates
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNMANNED_AIRCRAFT_TITLE Unmanned Aircraft ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNMANNED_AIRCRAFT_DESC An unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV; also known as a remotely piloted vehicle or RPV, or Unmanned Aircraft System (UAS)) is an aircraft that is flown by a pilot; however, without a human crew on board the aircraft. Their largest uses are in military applications. To distinguish UAVs from missiles, a UAV is defined[by whom?] as a reusable, remotely crewed aircraft capable of controlled, sustained, level flight and powered by a jet, reciprocating engine, or other source of propulsion. Therefore, cruise missiles are not considered UAVs, because, like many other guided missiles, the vehicle itself is a weapon that is not reused, even though it is also unmanned and in some cases remotely guided.
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNMANNED_AIRCRAFT_HELP Allows construction of the cheap and deadly Unmanned Bomber unit.
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNMANNED_AIRCRAFT_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"You don't win a war by dying for your country. You win a war by making the other son-of-a-bitch die for his."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - General George Patton
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPERCONDUCTORS_TITLE Superconductors ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPERCONDUCTORS_DESC Superconductivity is an electrical resistance of exactly zero which occurs in certain materials below a characteristic temperature. It was discovered by Heike Kamerlingh Onnes in 1911. Like ferromagnetism and atomic spectral lines, superconductivity is a quantum mechanical phenomenon. It is also characterized by a phenomenon called the Meissner effect, the ejection of any sufficiently weak magnetic field from the interior of the superconductor as it transitions into the superconducting state. The occurrence of the Meissner effect indicates that superconductivity cannot be understood simply as the idealization of "perfect conductivity" in classical physics.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPERCONDUCTORS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Large Hadron Collider[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases [ICON_RESEARCH] Science generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPERCONDUCTORS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The path of least resistance has been replaced by the path of pretty much no resistance."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown
TXT_KEY_TECH_CLONING_TITLE Cloning ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_CLONING_DESC Cloning in biology is the process of producing similar populations of genetically identical individuals that occurs in nature when organisms such as bacteria, insects or plants reproduce asexually. Cloning in biotechnology refers to processes used to create copies of DNA fragments (molecular cloning), cells (cell cloning), or organisms.
TXT_KEY_TECH_CLONING_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Body Exchange[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_CLONING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Today, the theory of evolution is an accepted fact for everyone but a fundamentalist minority, whose objections are based not on reasoning but on doctrinaire adherence to religious principles."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - James D. Watson
TXT_KEY_TECH_FUNCTIONAL_MRI_TITLE Functional MRI ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_FUNCTIONAL_MRI_DESC Functional MRI or functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging (fMRI) is a type of specialized MRI scan. It measures the hemodynamic response (change in blood flow) related to neural activity in the brain or spinal cord of humans or other animals. It is one of the most recently developed forms of neuroimaging. Since the early 1990s, fMRI has come to dominate the brain mapping field due to its relatively low invasiveness, absence of radiation exposure, and relatively wide availability.
TXT_KEY_TECH_FUNCTIONAL_MRI_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Human Brain Map[ENDCOLOR] wonder, which increases the [ICON_RESEARCH] Science that each specialist produces.
TXT_KEY_TECH_FUNCTIONAL_MRI_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"With fMRI, there were, consistently, unique areas of the brain -- and more of them -- that were activated during the deceptive process than during truth telling."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] Feroze B. Mohamed
TXT_KEY_TECH_VIRTUALIZATION_TITLE Virtualization ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_VIRTUALIZATION_DESC Virtualization is the process by which data is largely processed in a central computer center, and then streamed to the components who need it. This allows each user of information to have more information, at a cheaper cost, and in a fashion that allows for complete mobility.
TXT_KEY_TECH_VIRTUALIZATION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cloud Computing Network[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_VIRTUALIZATION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Together we do what individually we only dreamed of."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown
TXT_KEY_TECH_SOCIAL_NETWORKS_TITLE Social Networks ([ICON_CULTURE]/[ICON_HAPPINESS_1])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SOCIAL_NETWORKS_DESC A social network is a social structure made up of individuals (or organizations) called "nodes", which are tied (connected) by one or more specific types of interdependency, such as friendship, kinship, common interest, financial exchange, dislike, sexual relationships, or relationships of beliefs, knowledge or prestige.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Social network analysis views social relationships in terms of network theory consisting of nodes and ties (also called edges, links, or connections). Nodes are the individual actors within the networks, and ties are the relationships between the actors. The resulting graph-based structures are often very complex. There can be many kinds of ties between the nodes. Research in a number of academic fields has shown that social networks operate on many levels, from families up to the level of nations, and play a critical role in determining the way problems are solved, organizations are run, and the degree to which individuals succeed in achieving their goals.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In its simplest form, a social network is a map of specified ties, such as friendship, between the nodes being studied. The nodes to which an individual is thus connected are the social contacts of that individual. The network can also be used to measure social capital – the value that an individual gets from the social network. These concepts are often displayed in a social network diagram, where nodes are the points and ties are the lines.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SOCIAL_NETWORKS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Facebook[ENDCOLOR] Wonder.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SOCIAL_NETWORKS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"When you give everyone a voice and give people power, the system usually ends up in a really good place. So, what we view our role as, is giving people that power."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Mark Zuckerberg
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_LASERS_TITLE Advanced Lasers ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_LASERS_DESC Lasers have become strong enough to shoot down aircraft, and potentially even high speed missiles. Lasers are now powerful enough to initiate fusion reactions in hydrogen pellets.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_LASERS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Laser Perimeter Defense[ENDCOLOR] building.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_LASERS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"We manipulate nature as if we were stuffing an Alsatian goose. We create new forms of energy; we make new elements; we kill crops; we wash brains. I can hear them in the dark sharpening their lasers."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Erwin Chargaff
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_MAGNETICS_TITLE Advanced Magnetics ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_MAGNETICS_DESC Magnetic technology has progressed to the point where ships can now hurl metal projectiles at extreme velocities over great distances causing great destruction. Magnetic fields are now powerful enough and precise enough to harness the energy of the sun.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_MAGNETICS_HELP Allows construction of the powerful CGX Cruiser.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ADVANCED_MAGNETICS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The only way to predict the future is to have power to shape the future."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Eric Hoffer
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPER_BATTERIES_TITLE Super Batteries ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPER_BATTERIES_DESC Superbatteries show energy storage reaching critical mass. With the ability to store enough energy to drive or fly thousands of miles, they are only the beginning.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPER_BATTERIES_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Grid Energy Storage[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUPER_BATTERIES_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Energy and persistence conquer all things."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Benjamin Franklin
TXT_KEY_TECH_OPTICAL_COMPUTING_TITLE Optical Computing ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_OPTICAL_COMPUTING_DESC An optical computer (also called a photonic computer) is a device that uses the photons of visible light or infrared (IR) beams, rather than electrons in the electric current, to perform digital computations. An electric current creates heat in computer systems. As the processing speed increases, so does the amount of electricity required; this extra heat is extremely damaging to the hardware. Light, however, creates insignificant amounts of heat[dubious – discuss], regardless of how much is used. Thus, the development of more powerful processing systems becomes possible. By applying some of the advantages of visible and/or IR networks at the device and component scale, a computer might someday be developed that can perform operations significantly faster than a conventional electronic computer.
TXT_KEY_TECH_OPTICAL_COMPUTING_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Optical Interconnects[ENDCOLOR] building which increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science generation in your City.
TXT_KEY_TECH_OPTICAL_COMPUTING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"In 20 or 30 years, you'll be able to hold in your hand as much computing knowledge as exists now in the whole City, or even the whole world."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Douglas Englebart
TXT_KEY_TECH_METAMATERIALS_TITLE Metamaterials ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_METAMATERIALS_DESC Metamaterials are artificial materials engineered to provide properties which may not be readily available in nature. These materials usually gain their properties from structure rather than composition, using the inclusion of small inhomogeneities to enact effective macroscopic behavior. The primary research in metamaterials investigates materials with negative refractive index. Negative refractive index materials appear to permit the creation of superlenses which can have a spatial resolution below that of the wavelength. In other work, a form of 'invisibility' has been demonstrated at least over a narrow wave band with gradient-index materials. Although the first metamaterials were electromagnetic, acoustic and seismic metamaterials are also areas of active research.
TXT_KEY_TECH_METAMATERIALS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Stealth Submarine[ENDCOLOR] which is invisible to all but Destroyers and other Submarines.
TXT_KEY_TECH_METAMATERIALS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"O divine art of subtlety and secrecy! Through you we learn to be invisible, through you inaudible and hence we can hold the enemy's fate in our hands."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Sun Tzu
TXT_KEY_TECH_SCRAMJET_ENGINES_TITLE Scramjet Engines ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SCRAMJET_ENGINES_DESC A scramjet (supersonic combustion ramjet) is a variant of a ramjet airbreathing combustion jet engine in which the combustion process takes place in supersonic airflow. As in ramjets, a scramjet relies on high vehicle speed to forcefully compress and decelerate the incoming air before combustion (hence ramjet), but whereas a ramjet decelerates the air to subsonic velocities before combustion, airflow in a scramjet is supersonic throughout the entire engine. This allows the scramjet to efficiently operate at extremely high speeds: theoretical projections place the top speed of a scramjet between Mach 12 and Mach 24, which is near orbital veloCity. For comparison, the fastest manned airbreathing aircraft, the SR-71 Blackbird, has a maximum speed of Mach 3.2.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SCRAMJET_ENGINES_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hypersonic Cruise Missile[ENDCOLOR] which is an upgraded version of the Guided Missile.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SCRAMJET_ENGINES_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The backbone of surprise is fusing speed with secrecy."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Karl Von Clausewitz
TXT_KEY_TECH_MAGNETICS_MINIATURIZATION_TITLE Magnetics Miniaturization ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_MAGNETICS_MINIATURIZATION_DESC Magnetics Miniaturization is the culmination of an effort to make advanced magnetic devices more portable and scalable. As a result, railgun technology that was once only possible on gaint warships, is now available on smaller, tactical vehicles.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MAGNETICS_MINIATURIZATION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mass Driver Artillery[ENDCOLOR] which is an upgraded version of the Rocket Artillery and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gauss Tank[ENDCOLOR] which is an upgrade version of the Modern Armor.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MAGNETICS_MINIATURIZATION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"This is really miniaturization at its best."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Dave O'Brien
TXT_KEY_TECH_ROBOTIC_SURGERY_TITLE Robotic Surgery ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_ROBOTIC_SURGERY_DESC Robotic surgery, computer-assisted surgery, and robot-assisted surgery are terms for various technological developments that currently are developed to support a range of surgical procedures. Robot-assisted surgery was developed to overcome limitations of minimally invasive surgery, Instead of directly moving the instruments the surgeon uses a computer console to manipulate the instruments attached to multiple robot arms. The computer translates the surgeon’s movements, which are then carried out on the patient by the robot. Other features of the robotic system include, for example, an integrated tremor filter and the ability for scaling of movements (changing of the ratio between the extent of movements at the master console to the internal movements of the instruments attached to the robot). The console is located in the same operating room as the patient, but is physically separated from the operative workspace. Since the surgeon does not need to be in the immediate location of the patient while the operation is being performed, it can be possible for specialists to perform remote surgery on patients. Robots can perform surgery without a human surgeon.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ROBOTIC_SURGERY_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Robotic Operating Room[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] and [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ROBOTIC_SURGERY_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"If a man needs his appendix taken out, his gallbladder treated and some brain surgery as well, I don't think too many doctors would do the jobs simultaneously."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Bob Lavner
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_SYNTHESIS_TITLE Genetic Synthesis ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_SYNTHESIS_DESC Artificial gene synthesis is the process of synthesizing a gene in vitro without the need for initial template DNA samples. The main method is currently by oligonucleotide synthesis (also used for other applications) from digital genetic sequences and subsequent annealing of the resultant fragments. In contrast, natural DNA replication requires existing DNA templates for synthesizing new DNA. Synthesis of the first complete gene, a yeast tRNA, was demonstrated by Har Gobind Khorana and coworkers in 1972. Synthesis of the first peptide- and protein-coding genes was performed in the laboratories of Herbert Boyer and Alexander Markham, respectively.
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_SYNTHESIS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Dinosaur Park[ENDCOLOR] Wonder unit.
TXT_KEY_TECH_GENETIC_SYNTHESIS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Got into the gene pool while the lifeguard wasn't watching."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXOSKELETONS_TITLE Exoskeletons ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXOSKELETONS_DESC Humans have long used armor as an artificial exoskeleton for protection, especially in combat. Exoskeletal machines (also called powered exoskeletons) are now available to be used for military, medical, and industrial purposes.
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXOSKELETONS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Powered Infantry[ENDCOLOR] unit. Increases mine and lumbermill yields.
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXOSKELETONS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"History is much like an endless waltz. The three beats of war, peace, and revolution continue on forever."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Mariemaia Khushrenada
TXT_KEY_TECH_DIGITAL_DEFENSE_DOCTRINE_TITLE Digital Defense Doctrine ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_DIGITAL_DEFENSE_DOCTRINE_DESC Digital Defense Doctrine represents research encompassing several areas including using lasers to defend military installations and cities, Cyberwarfare, and secure encription of vital information. Cyberwarfare has been defined by government security expert Richard A. Clarke, in his book Cyber War, as "actions by a nation-state to penetrate another nation's computers or networks for the purposes of causing damage or disruption." The Economist describes cyber warfare as "the fifth domain of warfare," and William J. Lynn, U.S. Deputy Secretary of Defense, states that "as a doctrinal matter, the Pentagon has formally recognized cyberspace as a new domain in warfare . . . which has become just as critical to military operations as land, sea, air, and space."
TXT_KEY_TECH_DIGITAL_DEFENSE_DOCTRINE_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tactical Laser Air Defense[ENDCOLOR] unit and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cyber Command[ENDCOLOR] national wonder which increases City defense.
TXT_KEY_TECH_DIGITAL_DEFENSE_DOCTRINE_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The more reliant we become upon computers and information systems, the more vulnerable we become to cyber-terrorists who will conceive unlimited ways to cripple our infrastructure, our power grids, our banking systems, our financial markets, our space based communications systems."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - William S. Cohen
TXT_KEY_TECH_HYBRID_SCRAMJETS_TITLE Hybrid Scramjets ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_HYBRID_SCRAMJETS_DESC Previous efforts at reusable hypersonic aircraft design failed due to a lack of control over powerful scramjet engines which rely on supersonic airflow to sustain combustion. Using perfected scramjet technology from hypersonic cruise missiles, combined with electric turbine engines powered by super batteries, an extremely capable hybrid aircraft engine is possible. The endurance and controllability afforded by high power electic turbines, is augmented by the extremely high burst speed that the scramjet offers. As a result, you can now create reusable, stealth aircraft capable of tremendous speed and capability.
TXT_KEY_TECH_HYBRID_SCRAMJETS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hypersonic Bomber[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hypersonic Interceptor[ENDCOLOR]units. These powerful aircraft will the mainstay of your airforce for generations to come.
TXT_KEY_TECH_HYBRID_SCRAMJETS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"It'll be a great day when education gets all the money it wants and the Air Force has to hold a bake sale to buy bombers."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown
TXT_KEY_TECH_REACTOR_MINIATURIZATION_TITLE Reactor Miniaturization ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_REACTOR_MINIATURIZATION_DESC Reactor Miniaturization borrows advances from Magnetics Miniaturization to create relatively small fusion reactors. As a result, engineers can now squeeze a reactor into an aircraft carrier.
TXT_KEY_TECH_REACTOR_MINIATURIZATION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fusion Supercarrier[ENDCOLOR] which is an upgraded version of the Supercarrier.
TXT_KEY_TECH_REACTOR_MINIATURIZATION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"No really, now this is really miniaturization at its best."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown
TXT_KEY_TECH_QUANTUM_COMPUTERS_TITLE Quantum Computers ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_QUANTUM_COMPUTERS_DESC A quantum computer is a device for computation that makes direct use of quantum mechanical phenomena, such as superposition and entanglement, to perform operations on data. Quantum computers are different from traditional computers based on transistors. The basic principle behind quantum computation is that quantum properties can be used to represent data and perform operations on these data.
TXT_KEY_TECH_QUANTUM_COMPUTERS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Quantum Supercomputer[ENDCOLOR] national wonders, which greatly increases [ICON_RESEARCH] Science generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_QUANTUM_COMPUTERS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Nobody understands Quantum Theory."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Richard Feynman
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARTIFICIAL_INTELLIGENCE_TITLE Artificial Intelligence ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARTIFICIAL_INTELLIGENCE_DESC Artificial intelligence (AI) is the intelligence of machines and the branch of computer science that aims to create it. AI textbooks define the field as "the study and design of intelligent agents" where an intelligent agent is a system that perceives its environment and takes actions that maximize its chances of success. John McCarthy, who coined the term in 1956, defines it as "the science and engineering of making intelligent machines."
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARTIFICIAL_INTELLIGENCE_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]AI Core[ENDCOLOR] national wonder, which increases [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]3 Laws of Robotics[ENDCOLOR] national wonder which increases happiness in every City.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARTIFICIAL_INTELLIGENCE_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I visualize a time when we will be to robots what dogs are to humans, and I'm rooting for the machines."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - CLAUDE SHANNON
TXT_KEY_TECH_LASER_MANUFACTURING_TITLE Laser Manufacturing ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_LASER_MANUFACTURING_DESC Laser based additive manufacturing is accomplished by directing a high power laser at a substrate to create a melt pool. Material is then added to the melt pool. The added material enlarges the melt pool and adds to the part. To create the desired geometry, the laser is rastered across the substrate while material is continuously added.
TXT_KEY_TECH_LASER_MANUFACTURING_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Laser Manufacturing Module[ENDCOLOR] building which increases the [ICON_PRODUCTION]productiona and [ICON_GOLD]gold generation of the City.
TXT_KEY_TECH_LASER_MANUFACTURING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Production is not the application of tools to materials, but logic to work."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Peter F. Drucker
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_MECHANIZATION_TITLE Extreme Mechanization ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_MECHANIZATION_DESC Mechanization is providing human operators with machinery that assist them with the muscular requirements of work. Extreme mechanization is the culmination of several lines of work involving fusion reactor miniaturization, exoskeleton production, and advances in metamaterial science made while researching hybrid scramjets. This technology allows mankind to produce mechanized units on a scale that has never existed in human history. While this technology can greatly aid humanity in it's quest to tame nature, it's biggest use will likely be in humanity's quest to tame each other.
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_MECHANIZATION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]War Walker[ENDCOLOR] unit, which dominates the late digital era battlefield.
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_MECHANIZATION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The robot is going to lose. Not by much. But when the final score is tallied, flesh and blood is going to beat the damn monster."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Adam Smith
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNIFIED_FIELD_THEORY_TITLE Unified Field Theory ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNIFIED_FIELD_THEORY_DESC Unified Field Theory is a type of field theory that allows all that is usually thought of as fundamental forces and elementary particles to be written in terms of a single field.
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNIFIED_FIELD_THEORY_HELP Allows construction of future City force fields.
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNIFIED_FIELD_THEORY_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough"[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Albert Einstein
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_MAGELLAN_VOYAGE_DESC Magellan's Voyage
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_MAGELLAN_VOYAGE Ferdinand Magellan was a Portuguese explorer. He was born in Sabrosa, in northern Portugal, but later obtained Spanish nationality in order to serve King Charles I of Spain in search of a westward route to the "Spice Islands". Magellan's expedition of 1519–1522 became the first expedition to sail from the Atlantic Ocean into the Pacific Ocean (then named "peaceful sea" by Magellan; the passage being made via the Strait of Magellan), and the first to cross the Pacific. It also completed the first circumnavigation of the Earth, although Magellan himself did not complete the entire voyage, being killed during the Battle of Mactan in the Philippines.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_MAGELLAN_VOYAGE_HELP This unit receives +1 [ICON_MOVES] movement.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FOR_THE_KING_DESC For the King
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FOR_THE_KING The Crown Royalty policy found under the Monarchy government, provides this to all units in the empire. Due to heightened love for and loyalty to the Monarch, units will fight harder in battle.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FOR_THE_KING_HELP This unit receives +20% strength.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_OATH_DESC Oath
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_OATH Units in a Feudal system are experienced in assaulting fortified positions.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_OATH_HELP This unit recieves a +33% bonus when attacking fortified units.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FEROCITY_DESC Ferocity
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FEROCITY Units ruled by a Fascist government go on the attack with unmatched feroCity.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FEROCITY_HELP This unit recieves a +30% bonus on attack.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FATHERLAND_DESC Fatherland
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FATHERLAND Driven by national pride, units fight to the bitter end.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_FATHERLAND_HELP This unit heals every turn, even if it [ICON_MOVES] moves.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_JINGOIST_DESC Jingoist
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_JINGOIST Because your culture deserves to be spread. By force if necessary.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_JINGOIST_HELP This unit receives +20% strength.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_ECO_FANATIC_DESC Eco Fanatic
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_ECO_FANATIC Driven by national pride, units fight to the bitter end.
TXT_KEY_PROMOTION_ECO_FANATIC_HELP This unit ignores terrain cost, and pillaging does not consume movement points.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_CIVIL_ENGINEER Civil Engineer
TXT_KEY_UNIT_CIVIL_ENGINEER_TEXT A civil engineer is a person who practices civil engineering; the application of planning, designing, constructing, maintaining, and operating infrastructures while protecting the public and environmental health. As well as improving existing infrastructures that have been neglected. Originally, a civil engineer worked on public works projects and was contrasted with the military engineer, who worked on armaments and defenses. Over time, various branches of engineering have become recognized as distinct from civil engineering, including chemical engineering, mechanical engineering, and electrical engineering, while much of military engineering has been absorbed by civil engineering. In some places, a civil engineer may perform land surveying; in others, surveying is limited to construction surveying, unless an additional qualification is obtained. On some U.S. military bases, the personnel responsible for building and grounds maintenance, such as grass mowing, are called civil engineers and are not required to meet any minimum educational requirements.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_CIVIL_ENGINEER_HELP Industrial upgrade to the ancient worker unit. The Civil Engineer recieves none of the standard bonuses of the worker but is 150% more efficient.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_MISSILE_SQUAD Missile Squad
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_MISSILE_SQUAD_TEXT The missile squad is a unit that wields a variety of shoulder launched missile weapons. A shoulder-launched missile weapon is a weapon that fires a projectile at a target, yet is small enough to be carried by a single person, and fired while held on one's shoulder. "Missile" is used here in the original broad sense: today the word has a strong connotation with the concept of a guided rocket. There are two kinds of shoulder launched weapons. The first is the recoilless gun, which is essentially an open tube. When fired the reaction gases (with a momentum equal to the projectile) expelled out of the back of the weapon compensate the force exerted on the projectile. The other type uses rocket propelled projectiles; these typically also use a small recoilless charge to get the projectile out of the barrel and to a distance where the operator will not be hurt by the rocket's backblast; when the rocket ignites at a safe distance, it further accelerates the projectile or at least keeps it from decelerating in its trajectory. The smallest shoulder-launched rocket weapons are rocket-propelled grenades (RPG). There are also larger "dumb" shoulder-launched missiles, used in a similar way to an RPG, but with far greater destructive power. A number of specialised "smart" missiles are available in shoulder-launched forms, including anti-tank guided missiles and man-portable air-defense systems (MANPADs), surface-to-air missiles used as anti-aircraft, typically using infrared homing and used to target helicopters and other low-flying aircraft.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_MISSILE_SQUAD Starts with the Range promotion allowing this unit to attack form further away.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A late Industrial upgrade to the Machine Gunner, this unit is able to hit targets from further away thereby increasing survivability and ultimiately lethality.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_SUPERCARRIER Supercarrier
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_SUPERCARRIER_TEXT Supercarrier is an unofficial descriptive term for the largest type of aircraft carrier, usually displacing over 70,000 long tons. The U.S. Navy currently has 11 such ships.[2] In comparison, a few countries operate medium carriers of around 40,000 tons (such as Charles de Gaulle), whereas light carriers closer to 20,000 tons (such as HMS Illustrious) are more typical. Supercarriers are the largest warships ever built.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_SUPERCARRIER More powerful version of the normal carrier.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Nuclear Plant required.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Carries up to 4 Aircraft.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_COMBAT_CONTROLLER Combat Controller
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_COMBAT_CONTROLLER_TEXT Combat Controllers (CCT) are ground combat forces specialized in a traditional pathfinder role while having a heavy emphasis on simultaneous air traffic control, fire support and command, control, and communications in covert or austere environments. Assigned to Special Tactics Squadrons, Combat Controllers are an integral part of Air Force Special Operations Command (AFSOC), the Air Force component of United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM). Combat Controllers are often assigned individually or as a team to Army Special Forces, Army Ranger, and Navy SEAL teams to provide expert air support coordination and communications capabilities.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_COMBAT_CONTROLLER Starts with the Range promotion allowing this unit to attack form further away.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A late Modern upgrade to the Missile Squad, this unit is uses modern fire support abilities to accurately bring firepower down upon enemy units at range.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_STEALTH_FIGHTER Stealth Fighter
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_MODERN_STEALTHFIGHTER_TEXT Stealth aircraft are aircraft that use stealth technology to interfere with radar detection as well as means other than conventional aircraft by employing a combination of features to reduce visibility in the infrared, visual, audio, and radio frequency (RF) spectrum. Development of stealth technology likely began in Germany during WWII. Well-known modern examples of stealth aircraft include the United States' F-117 Nighthawk, the B-2 Spirit "Stealth Bomber", the F-22 Raptor, and the F-35 Lightning II.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_STEALTH_FIGHTER Stealth Air Unit designed to wrest control of the skies and intercept incoming enemy aircraft.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Aircraft Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_UNMANNED_AIRCRAFT Unmanned Aircraft
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_UNMANNED_AIRCRAFT_TEXT An unmanned aerial vehicle is an aircraft that is flown by a pilot; however, without a human crew on board the aircraft. Their largest uses are in military applications. To distinguish UAVs from missiles, a UAV is defined as a reusable, remotely crewed aircraft capable of controlled, sustained, level flight. Therefore, cruise missiles are not considered UAVs, because, like many other guided missiles, the vehicle itself is a weapon that is not reused, even though it is also unmanned and in some cases remotely guided.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_UNMANNED_AIRCRAFT A long-range Air Unit that rains death from above onto enemy Units and Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Aircraft Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_TACTICAL_LASER_AIR_DEFENSE Tactical Laser Air Defense
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_TACTICAL_LASER_AIR_DEFENSE_TEXT The Tactical Laser Air Defense unit takes advances in laser technology from fusion research, and applies it to shooting enemy aircraft out of the skies. Short ranged, but deadly efficient.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_TACTICAL_LASER_AIR_DEFENSE An advanced upgrade for the Mobile SAM air defense unit.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_DDX_DESTROYER DDX Destroyer
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_DDX_DESTROYER_TEXT Next generation destroyer equipped with electromagnetic rail guns and a powerful sonar suite for searching out enemy submarines. After initally being cancelled due to a lack of need for a new generation of surface warships, it was put back on the table after rail gun technology finally became feasible. There is not other ship on the seas that is as capable at long range destruction.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_DDX_DESTROYER Tough Naval Unit specialized in long range bombardment and subhunting.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_CGX_CRUISER CGX Cruiser
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_CGX_CRUISER_TEXT Next generation cruiser equipped with electromagnetic rail guns and a 100MW nuclear power plant to supply energy for both the railguns and propulsion. After initally being cancelled due to a lack of need for a new generation of surface warships, it was put back on the table after rail gun technology finally became feasible. There is not other ship on the seas that is as capable at long range destruction.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_CGX_CRUISER Tough Naval Unit specialized in long range bombardment and warding off enemy aircraft.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Shipyard required.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can also hold 3 Missiles
TXT_KEY_UNIT_STEALTH_GUNSHIP Stealth Gunship
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_STEALTH_GUNSHIP_TEXT Advances in Metamaterials and rotor design have culminated in this super stealthy attack helicopter. It's radar cross section is minimal, and it's rotor noise is orders of magnitude less than traditional helicopters, thus allowing it to sneak up on enemy forces and deliver devastating firepower.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_STEALTH_GUNSHIP Powerful upgrade from the Helicopter Gunship.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Aircraft Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_STEALTH_SUBMARINE Stealth Submarine
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_STEALTH_SUBMARINE_TEXT Advances in acoustic Metamaterials have allowed for the creation of the Stealth Submarine which has unprecedented noise reduction compared to other submarines, allowing the unit even greater ability to sneak up on enemy ships.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_STEALTH_SUBMARINE Powerful upgrade from the Submarine and Nuclear Submarine.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Shipyard required.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Carries up to 2 Missiles.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HYPERSONIC_CRUISE_MISSILE Hypersonic Cruise Missile
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_HYPERSONIC_CRUISE_MISSILE_TEXT Hypersonic Cruise Missiles travel faster than Mach 5 and are designed to breach enemy defenses and arrive on target with short notice using extreme speed.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_HYPERSONIC_CRUISE_MISSILE Powerful upgrade from the guided missile.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_GAUSS_TANK Gauss Tank
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_GAUSS_TANK_TEXT Using a variation of railgun technology commonly called the Gauss Rifle, main battle tanks can now propel deadly projectiles further, faster, and harder than ever before.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_GAUSS_TANK Powerful upgrade from the Modern Armor.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Auto Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_MASS_DRIVER_ARTILLERY Mass Driver Artillery
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_MASS_DRIVER_ARTILLERY_TEXT Using rail gun technology it is now possible to create mobile artillery pieces with much greater range. The ability to hit your opponents from such great distances can be a great advantage to most any armed forces.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_MASS_DRIVER_ARTILLERY Powerful upgrade from the Rocket Artillery.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Auto Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_POWERED_INFANTRY Powered Infantry
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_POWERED_INFANTRY_TEXT The Future Force Warrior concept envisions the radical use of technologies such as nanotechnology, powered exoskeletons, and magnetorheological fluid-based body armor to provide the infantry with significantly higher force multiplier than the opposing force. However, the stated concept is not U.S. Army doctrine, and is not intended to answer every situation that Army After Next (the Army's buzzword for future fighting forces) would face; rather, the concept is meant to serve as an end goal to strive to reach or to compromise with current technologies and to stir imagination and dialogue on how these technologies and concepts can help soldiers in the near future.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_POWERED_INFANTRY Fast, basic Unit of the Digital Era that can Paradrop.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_FUSION_SUPERCARRIER Fusion Supercarrier
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_FUSION_SUPERCARRIER_TEXT The Fusion Supercarrier comes from the evolution of carrier design, coupled with the advances in reactor miniaturization. The Fusion Supercarrier can travel faster, launch more sorties, and generally survive far greater attacks against it.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_FUSION_SUPERCARRIER Upgraded version of the Supercarrier.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Shipyard required.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Carries up to 4 Aircraft.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HYPERSONIC_BOMBER Hypersonic Bomber
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_HYPERSONIC_BOMBER_TEXT The Hypersonic Bomber is a hybrid, manned or unmanned(depending on the mission), bomber that is the fastest heavy lift aircraft yet produced. Original research and production had a single idea in mind: Unprecedented speed. The Hypersonic Bomber delivers that and more using 2 extremely high thrust scramjets and 2 high endurance, high range electric turbine engines. The result is a plane that has phenomenal range, minimum time to target, and devastating high veloCity warheads. Also, utilizing the latest in metamaterial technology, this bomber is able to evade enemy detection techniques allowing the bomber critical seconds needed to reach it's target and escape intact.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_HYPERSONIC_BOMBER A long-range heavy Air Unit that obliterates enemy forces.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Aircraft Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HYPERSONIC_INTERCEPTOR Hypersonic Interceptor
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_HYPERSONIC_INTERCEPTOR_TEXT The Hypersonic Interceptor is an unmanned fighter that uses scramjets to it's utmost advantage allowing it to engage enemy aircraft in shorter time, and at longer ranges than any fighter aircraft before it. The severe G-Forces exibited by the dual scramjet thrust vectoring engines is so severe that no human could possibly pilot the Interceptor in combat and survive. The addition of the latest metamaterials allows the Interceptor to get the drop on enemy aircraft sooner, often proving critical to mission success.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_HYPERSONIC_INTERCEPTOR A long-range air superiority fighter designed with the sole purpose of taking down enemy Hypersonic Bombers.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Advanced Aircraft Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_MICRO_UAV_TEAM Micro UAV Team
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_MICRO_UAV_TEAM_TEXT The Micro UAV Team came about with the cheap mass production of small Unmanned Aerial Vehicles. Usings micro UAV's this unit can hit enemies at range with large numbers of guided rockets and small caliber munitions.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_MICRO_UAV_TEAM An upgrade of the Combat Controller that uses swarms of micro UAV's to barrage enemy units with ordinance.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_ORBITAL_STRIKE_MISSILE Orbital Strike Missile
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_ORBITAL_STRIKE_MISSILE_TEXT Equipped with the latest nanomaterials, Orbital Strike Missiles are able to reach orbital veloCity and then slam down on their targets at speeds exceeding Mach 15.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_ORBITAL_STRIKE_MISSILE Powerful upgrade from the Hypersonic Cruise Missile.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_SPACE_BOMBER Space Bomber
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_SPACE_BOMBER_TEXT The Space Bomber uses past bomber technology, combined with Smart Materials and lightweight nanomaterials to enable it to reach orbital veloCity, vastly increasing it's strike power and allowing it to bomb almost anywhere on the planet.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_SPACE_BOMBER A long-range heavy Air Unit that obliterates enemy forces.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Molecular Fabrication Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_SPACE_FIGHTER Space Fighter
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_SPACE_FIGHTER_TEXT The Space Fighter, like the Space Bomber, uses the latest in materials science to allow it to take the fight to space, and practically anywhere on the planet.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_SPACE_FIGHTER A long-range air superiority fighter designed with the sole purpose of taking down enemy Space Bombers.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Molecular Fabrication Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HUNTER_KILLER Hunter Killer
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_HUNTER_KILLER_TEXT The Gunship has gone unmanned, tilt rotored, and electrojet powered. This results in an aircraft that has more range, speed, and lethality.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_HUNTER_KILLER Powerful upgrade from the Stealth Gunship.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Molecular Fabrication Plant required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_FUSION_TANK Fusion Tank
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_FUSION_TANK_TEXT Fusion Tanks combine several powerful new technologies to create the ultimate frontline armor unit. The Fusion Tank comes equipped with a particle beam cannon, heavy composite carbon graphene armor, a miniature force field generator, and 4 heavy levitation motors. Very expensive, and very deadly.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_FUSION_TANK Powerful upgrade from the Gauss Tank.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Beam Foundry required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HEAVY_ISOTOPE_PROJECTOR Heavy Isotope Projector
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_HEAVY_ISOTOPE_PROJECTOR_TEXT Using a form of particle beam technology, the Heavy Isotope Projector accelerates small slugs of extremely dense isotopes to very high speeds reaching record distances. When the slugs fall back to earth, they strike with such veloCity that they detonate on impact, shredding armor and anything beneath it. The addition of 4 heavy levitation motors allows these behemoths to stay close on the tails of the front line units.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_HEAVY_ISOTOPE_PROJECTOR Powerful upgrade from the Mass Driver Artillery.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Beam Foundry required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_BEAM_JUMPER Beam Jumper
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_BEAM_JUMPER_TEXT The Beam Jumper is a an upgrade of the War Walker that comes equipped with rapid fire particle beam cannons, miniature shield generator, and thick composite carbon graphene armor. The Beam Jumper also has powerful motors and electrojet boosters that allow it short but powerful leaps across territory, which is where it derives it's name.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_BEAM_JUMPER Powerful upgrade from the War Walker.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Beam Foundry required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_PLASMA_DESTROYER Plasma Destroyer
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_PLASMA_DESTROYER_TEXT The latest Nanotech solution to your subhunting needs. This destroyer is named for it's powerful plasma toroid launchers that wreak havoc on unarmored ground units. It has powerful sonar sensors and special torpedoes designed to go deep and crack even the toughest graphene hulls.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_PLASMA_DESTROYER Tough Naval Unit specialized subhunting.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Vacuum Drydock required.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_FUSION_DREADNOUGHT Fusion Dreadnought
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_FUSION_DREADNOUGHT_TEXT The ultimate in surface warships, this 70,000 ton ship will obliterate anything within a 5 hex radius and will be hell to bring down. Eight heavy isotope projectors, close in anti-air particle beams, 2 fusion reactors, and 6 heavy forcefield generators; This behemoth of the seas will strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_FUSION_DREADNOUGHT Tough Naval Unit specialized in long range bombardment and warding off enemy aircraft.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Vacuum Drydock required.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can hold 4 Missiles
TXT_KEY_UNIT_SUPERCAVITATING_SUBMARINE Supercavitating Submarine
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_SUPERCAVITATING_SUBMARINE_TEXT The latest arms race involving Submarines has evolved from total silence to supersonic speeds. Supercavitation is the art of accelerating underwater objects, such as Torpedoes, to supersonic speeds by ejecting a gas bubble ahead of the submersible greatly reducing drag. The Supercavitation technology has been found in torpedoes for decades, allowing them to reach speeds that once only aircraft could attain. These subs will speed into range of enemy ships, release salvoes of supersonic torpedoes, and then speed out again, often before enemy sonar even hears it coming. Needless to say, this advance in submersible warfare has captains all over the oceans terrified.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_SUPERCAVITATING_SUBMARINE Powerful upgrade from the Stealth Submarine.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Vacuum Drydock required.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Carries up to 2 Missiles.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_SUBMERSIBLE_CARRIER Submersible Carrier
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_SUBMERSIBLE_CARRIER_TEXT The trend towards missiles, aircraft, and other long range projectiles has led to the creation of giant aircraft carriers that can hide under the waves. While their extreme size prohibits them from diving as deep as other submarines, they can generally attain depths that prohibits detection. Advanced Automation allows these carriers to launch and capture their entire compliment of aircraft in a very short amount of time, reducing their time spent on the surface, and as a result, vulnerability to enemy attack.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_SUBMERSIBLE_CARRIER Upgraded underwater version of the Fusion Supercarrier.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Vacuum Drydock required.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Carries up to 4 Aircraft.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_PARTICLE_GRID_AIR_DEFENSE Particle Grid Air Defense
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_PARTICLE_GRID_AIR_DEFENSE_TEXT The Particle Grid Air Defense unit takes advances in particle beam technology to the next level using certain concepts from Warp Theory. While space is not actually warped in the application of this weapon, it uses certain advanced particle wave concepts to scatter the beam like a shotgun until the aircraft trajectory is precisely pinpointed, and then focuses the beam for the kill.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_PARTICLE_GRID_AIR_DEFENSE An advanced upgrade for the Tactical Laser Air Defense unit.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_CYBERNETIC_MARAUDER Cybernetic Marauder
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_CYBERNETIC_MARAUDER_TEXT The Cybernetic Marauder uses the great strength and durability provided by cybernetics to carry and use large amounts of Micro UAV's, shoulder mounted missile launchers, laser designators, and numerous other weapons while maintaining high mobility..
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_CYBERNETIC_MARAUDER A faster, more powerful upgrade of the Micro UAV Team with the capability to paradrop and ignores terrain cost.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_LEAP_INFANTRY Leap Infantry
TXT_KEY_CIVILOPEDIA_UNITS_LEAP_INFANTRY_TEXT Leap Infantry utilize advanced cybernetics and powerful exoskeletons to provide a powerful frontline intantry unit. Similar to the Beam Jumpers these infantry can leap long distances, which is where their name originates.
TXT_KEY_UNIT_HELP_LEAP_INFANTRY Fast, expendable unit of the NanoTech Era that can leap long distances and ignores terrain cost.
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOCOMPUTER_INTERFACE_DESC BioComputer Interface ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOCOMPUTER_INTERFACE_CIV The Bio Computer Interface is a long awaited advancement allowing direct thought control over computer systems, extending into the realm of other mechanical and electrical systems that are computer controlled.
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOCOMPUTER_INTERFACE_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bio Memory Implant[ENDCOLOR] which increases all aspects of the economy.
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOCOMPUTER_INTERFACE_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Those who underestimate the effects of human telepathy and telekinesis on society will be left behind by the tempest of innovation that is sure to follow."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown
TXT_KEY_TECH_FERTILIZER_CIV Fertilizer is a substance that feeds and speeds the growth of plants. Fertilizer has been around for as long as human civilization, dating back to the time when the first farmer realized that grass grew taller where the oxen had pooped. From that point on farmers have been collecting animal by-products and applying them to the soil, increasing the crop yield, especially from fields that have been farmed continuously for generations and thus have been stripped of most nutrients.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fertilizers generally contain nitrogen, phosphorous, and potassium as their active ingredients. While historically most of the fertilizers have been organic and animal-based, many modern fertilizers are actually mined from beneath the earth's surface or chemically manufactured in vast factories.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As the world's population has increased, so has the need for ever more potent fertilizers, and today's farms are far more productive than at any other time in history. However, this productivity has come at a price: rainwater from farms carries the fertilizer into streams and rivers, causing explosive growth in certain microorganisms which grow so fast they almost literally choke the life out of the waterway. Also, many modern fertilizers are created at least in part from petrochemicals, and their price can fluctuate dramatically along with the price of oil. In short, fertilizers are extremely useful and can greatly increase the world's food supply, but care must be taken to ensure that they don't do more harm to the environment than good.
TXT_KEY_TECH_NANO_MASS_PRODUCTION_DESC Nano Mass Production ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_NANO_MASS_PRODUCTION_CIV Nano Mass Production is a breakthrough in research to turn Nanotechnology into the everyday products that they have always promised to be.
TXT_KEY_TECH_NANO_MASS_PRODUCTION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Nano Forge[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases production.
TXT_KEY_TECH_NANO_MASS_PRODUCTION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"A world of perfection awaits."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Unknown
TXT_KEY_TECH_LEVITATION_MOTORS_DESC Levitation Motors ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_LEVITATION_MOTORS_CIV Using concepts taken from Unified Field Theory and NanoTechnology, Levitation motors harness the magnetic field in a powerful way allowing the leveraging of the earth's magnetic field to lift heavy objects off the ground, thereby allowing a greater freedom of movement.
TXT_KEY_TECH_LEVITATION_MOTORS_HELP Increases the rate of movement on roads and railroads.
TXT_KEY_TECH_LEVITATION_MOTORS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Fair is foul, and foul is fair: Hover through the fog and filthy air."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - William Shakespeare
TXT_KEY_TECH_2D_ENERGY_FIELDS_DESC 2D Energy Fields ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_2D_ENERGY_FIELDS_CIV 2 Dimensional Energy Fields is an application of the Unified Field Theory where Magnetic Fields are compressed to 2 Dimensions, and then molded to the desired purpose; namely force fields that can shield against large quantities of force and who are only limited by the storage of electrical power.
TXT_KEY_TECH_2D_ENERGY_FIELDS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Force Field[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases City defense.
TXT_KEY_TECH_2D_ENERGY_FIELDS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Remember-you can't beam through a force field. So, don't try it."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - William Shatner
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_EVOLUTION_DESC AI Evolution ([ICON_CULTURE]/[ICON_HAPPINESS_1])
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_EVOLUTION_CIV AI Evolution represents the change from being a giant mind in a vast supercomputer, to being the everpresent force found in all intelligent devices. Despite being long heralded as the doom of our civilization, Artificial Intelligence has become an integral part to the modern society, and in fact merging itself with our daily lives.
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_EVOLUTION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"A year spent in artificial intelligence is enough to make one believe in God."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Alan Perlis
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_EVOLUTION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]AI Court[ENDCOLOR] which removes [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] from Occupation and increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation..
TXT_KEY_TECH_SPACE_WEAPONIZATION_DESC Space Weaponization ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SPACE_WEAPONIZATION_CIV The Weaponization of Space represents the final removal of political and technological hurdles to deploying weapons systems in earth's orbit and beyond. Beginning with Orbital Strike Missiles capable of devastating kinetic strikes, Space Weaponization will eventually bring every concievable conventional and nuclear weapon system mankind is capable of developing into outer space.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SPACE_WEAPONIZATION_HELP Allows construction of the devastating [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Orbital Strike Missile[ENDCOLOR] unit.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SPACE_WEAPONIZATION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"It’s politically sensitive, but it’s going to happen. Some people don’t want to hear this, and it sure isn’t in vogue, but—absolutely—we’re going to fight in space. We’re going to fight from space and we’re going to fight into space. That’s why the US has development programs in directed energy and hit-to-kill mechanisms. We will engage terrestrial targets someday—ships, airplanes, land targets—from space."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - General Joseph W. Ashy, Commander, US Space Command
TXT_KEY_TECH_SMART_MATERIALS_DESC Smart Materials ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SMART_MATERIALS_CIV Smart materials are materials that have one or more properties that can be significantly changed in a controlled fashion by external stimuli, such as stress, temperature, moisture, pH, electric or magnetic fields.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SMART_MATERIALS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Space Fighter[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Space Bomber[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hunter Killer[ENDCOLOR] attack helicopter, and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Molecular Fabrication Plant[ENDCOLOR] which is required for construction of many Nano Age military units.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SMART_MATERIALS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"What we are interested in is merging the computer with the clothing so that all you need to do is get dressed."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Neil Gershenfeld
TXT_KEY_TECH_PARTICLE_BEAMS_DESC Particle Beams ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_PARTICLE_BEAMS_CIV A particle beam weapon uses an ultra-high-energy beam of atoms or electrons (i.e. a particle beam) to damage a material target by hitting it, and thus disrupting its atomic and molecular structure. A particle beam weapon is a type of directed-energy weapon, which directs energy in a particular direction by a means of particle projectiles with mass. Some of these weapons are real or practical; some are science fiction.
TXT_KEY_TECH_PARTICLE_BEAMS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fusion Tank[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Heavy Isotope Projector[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beam Jumper[ENDCOLOR], and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beam Foundry[ENDCOLOR] which is required for construction of many Nano Age particle beam wielding military units.
TXT_KEY_TECH_PARTICLE_BEAMS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"But while it will make every nation safe against any attack by a would-be invader, the death-beam by its nature could not be employed similarly as a weapon for offense. For this death-beam, could be generated only from large, stationary and immovable power plants, stationed in the manner of old-time forts at various strategic distances from each country's border. An exception however, must be made in the case of battleships, which would be able to equip themselves with smaller plants for generating the death-beam, with enough power to destroy any airplane approaching for attack from the air."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Nikola Tesla (inventor of the first particle beam weapon)
TXT_KEY_ERA_71 NanoTech Era
TXT_KEY_ERA_8 Diamond Era
TXT_KEY_TECH_MIND_MELDING_DESC Mind Melding ([ICON_CULTURE]/[ICON_HAPPINESS_1])
TXT_KEY_TECH_MIND_MELDING_CIV Mind Melding takes advances in mind manipulation and allows 2 or more humans to temporarily combine their thoughts as one. Not only does this allow high speed passing of technical information, but for the first time true emotions can be shared between individuals, with great, far reaching, and ultimately unforseeable consequences.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MIND_MELDING_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Empathic Network[ENDCOLOR] which increases the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, AND [ICON_GOLD] Gold of all specialists in your empire.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MIND_MELDING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The miracle is this: the more we share the more we have."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Leonard Nimoy
TXT_KEY_TECH_SENTIENT_ROBOTS_DESC Sentient Robots ([ICON_CULTURE]/[ICON_HAPPINESS_1])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SENTIENT_ROBOTS_CIV Sentient robots represents the final realization, or perhaps general reluctant acceptance, by humans that sentient machines are real, and they are here to stay. While this does not guarantee robots any rights or priveledges, it does bring them a step up from being officially regarded as mere tools.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SENTIENT_ROBOTS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Robot District[ENDCOLOR] and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Robotic Egalitarian Act[ENDCOLOR].
TXT_KEY_TECH_SENTIENT_ROBOTS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"But hath not a robot eyes? Hath not a robot hands, organs, dimensions, senses, affections, passions? If you prick us, do we not bleed?"[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Johnny Five
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNDERWATER_HABITATION_DESC Underwater Habitation ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNDERWATER_HABITATION_CIV Underwater Habitation is the culmination of years of overcrowding, combined with the technology and materials to do something about it. Humans can now begin to seriously colonize the other 75% of the earth that is currently uninhabited mankind, to the benefit or detriment of the planet, depending on your viewpoint.
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNDERWATER_HABITATION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ocean Habitat Prototype[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases nearby sea tile yields and sets the stage for future underwater cities.
TXT_KEY_TECH_UNDERWATER_HABITATION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The extreme conditions of a long underwater mission are similar to those of space. Someday, these techniques could be used in long-duration, manned space flights."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - David Williams
TXT_KEY_TECH_WORMHOLE_DETECTION_DESC Wormhole Detection ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_WORMHOLE_DETECTION_CIV Wormhole Detection is the latest scientific pursuit of the unknown. Advances in Field Theories and their practical applications have allowed scientists to detect ripples and changes in the fabric of spacetime, leading to the possibility of proving the existence of wormholes once and for all. Scientists have no clear consensus on what finding such a wormhole might mean for science or humanity, but they are not wasting any time in finding out.
TXT_KEY_TECH_WORMHOLE_DETECTION_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Wormhole Detection Array[ENDCOLOR] which completes the science victory for it's creator.
TXT_KEY_TECH_WORMHOLE_DETECTION_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The Air Force is to be applauded for investigating technologies that may have value for national security, ... But wormholes, negative energies, warped space-time, etc., require futuristic technologies centuries to millions of years ahead of ours. The only thing going down the wormhole is taxpayers' money."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Michio Kaku
TXT_KEY_TECH_WARP_FIELD_THEORY_DESC Warp Field Theory ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_WARP_FIELD_THEORY_CIV Warp Field Theory encompasses the manipulation of spacetime in ways feasible by and beneficial to mankind.
TXT_KEY_TECH_WARP_FIELD_THEORY_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Particle Grid Air Defense[ENDCOLOR] and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Space Manipulation Testing Station[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases great scientist generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_WARP_FIELD_THEORY_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Since the mathematicians have invaded the theory of relativity, I do not understand it myself anymore."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Albert Einstein
TXT_KEY_TECH_ULTRA_PRESSURE_MACHINERY_DESC Ultra Pressure Machinery ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_ULTRA_PRESSURE_MACHINERY_CIV Ultra Pressure Machinery allows the use of highly precise, advanced machinery in extremely pressurized environments found both at the bottom of the ocean, and within the ultra high pressure environments found in fusion reactors.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ULTRA_PRESSURE_MACHINERY_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Plasma Destroyer[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fusion Dreadnought[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Supercavitating Submarine[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Submersible Carrier[ENDCOLOR], and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Vacuum Drydock[ENDCOLOR] which is required for construction of many Nano Age sea units.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ULTRA_PRESSURE_MACHINERY_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The machine does not isolate us from the great problems of nature but plunges us more deeply into them."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Antoine de Saint-Exupery
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_ENGINEERING_DESC Extreme Engineering ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_ENGINEERING_CIV Extreme Engineering represents the height of human engineering. Using the latest processes, materials, and tools, projects of unheard of magnitude can be undertaken and accomplished.
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_ENGINEERING_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Space Elevator[ENDCOLOR] national wonder which greatly increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture generation in the City of it's origin.
TXT_KEY_TECH_EXTREME_ENGINEERING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Scientists investigate that which already is; Engineers create that which has never been."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Albert Einstein
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARCOLOGIES_DESC Arcologies ([ICON_PRODUCTION])
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARCOLOGIES_CIV Arcology, a combination of the words "architecture" and "ecology", is a set of architectural design principles aimed toward the design of enormous habitats (hyperstructures) of extremely high human population density. These largely hypothetical structures would contain a variety of residential, commercial, and agricultural facilities and minimize individual human environmental impact. They are often portrayed as self-contained or economically self-sufficient.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARCOLOGIES_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Arcology[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_ARCOLOGIES_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"We cannot afford to permit squalid overcrowding or the kind of living system which makes impossible the decencies and necessities of life."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Teddy Rossevelt
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUBLIMINAL_MIND_CONTROL_DESC Subliminal Mind Control ([ICON_CULTURE]/[ICON_HAPPINESS_1])
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUBLIMINAL_MIND_CONTROL_CIV BioComputer Interfaces allow human, and even animal, users to directly access and control information technology using only their bodies and even thoughts.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUBLIMINAL_MIND_CONTROL_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mind Control Network[ENDCOLOR] which greatly increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness at the expense of economic production.
TXT_KEY_TECH_SUBLIMINAL_MIND_CONTROL_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"All wrong-doing arises because of mind. If mind is transformed can wrong-doing remain?"[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Buddha
TXT_KEY_TECH_CYBERNETIC_ORGANISMS_DESC Cybernetic Organisms ([ICON_STRENGTH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_CYBERNETIC_ORGANISMS_CIV Cyborg(CYBernetic ORGanism) A being that is part human and part machine. The term was coined in 1960 by Manfred Clynes and Nathan Kline in an article they wrote about how humans can survive in space. For centuries, various cultures have fantasized about half human-half artificial beings; however, in the 20th century this concept materialized in the form of artificial limbs, pacemakers and other bionic devices.
TXT_KEY_TECH_CYBERNETIC_ORGANISMS_HELP Allows training of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Leap Infantry[ENDCOLOR] and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cybernetic Marauder[ENDCOLOR] which are two cheap Nano Age mainstay units.
TXT_KEY_TECH_CYBERNETIC_ORGANISMS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I'm a cybernetic organism: living tissue over a metal endoskeleton."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - The Terminator
TXT_KEY_TECH_NEURAL_REPROGRAMMING_DESC Neural Reprogramming ([ICON_CULTURE]/[ICON_HAPPINESS_1])
TXT_KEY_TECH_NEURAL_REPROGRAMMING_CIV Neural Reprogramming is a highly controversial technology that allows the reprogramming of human minds. Primarily focused and championed as a cure for violent criminals and incurable psychiatric patients, this technology could potentially be applied to the average citizen.
TXT_KEY_TECH_NEURAL_REPROGRAMMING_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Behavioral Mod Chip[ENDCOLOR] which increases economic activity by lowering crime and mental illness.
TXT_KEY_TECH_NEURAL_REPROGRAMMING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"It is a man's own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Buddha
TXT_KEY_TECH_MECHANICAL_BODY_GRAFTING_DESC Mechanical Body Grafting ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_MECHANICAL_BODY_GRAFTING_CIV Mechanical Body Grafting represents a breakthrough in the ability to physically fuse human flesh with mechanical implements. In the past, such mechanical aids were attached using age old methods involving simply strapping them to the body, with minimal support or control ability. Now, mechanical body parts can be fused to the body in such a way that they are practically an extension therof. The body powers it, and the mind controls it, seemlessly.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MECHANICAL_BODY_GRAFTING_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Implant Station[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.
TXT_KEY_TECH_MECHANICAL_BODY_GRAFTING_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Gentlemen, we can rebuild him, we have the technology, we have the capability to build the world's first bionic man. Steve Austin will be that man. We can make him better than he was before; better, stronger, faster."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Oscar Goldman
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOLOGICAL_SYNTHESIS_DESC Biological Synthesis ([ICON_RESEARCH])
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOLOGICAL_SYNTHESIS_CIV Biological Synthesis represents a breakthrough in the ability to create tailored biological material from scratch, with or without a base template. While primarily focused on the matching of biological materials to prohibit rejection, labs and factories can now create large quantities of precisely designed food for human or animal consumption. Another benefit of this research is the ability to begin research into the creation of new and unique life forms.
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOLOGICAL_SYNTHESIS_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beef Vat[ENDCOLOR] which can supply a near endless source of food.
TXT_KEY_TECH_BIOLOGICAL_SYNTHESIS_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The synthesis of pure, calming food is breathing pure air, listening to good sounds, looking at good sights, and touching pure objects."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Sri Sathya Sai Baba
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_SURVEILLANCE_DESC AI Surveillance ([ICON_CULTURE]/[ICON_HAPPINESS_1])
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_SURVEILLANCE_CIV AI Surveillance combines advances in Artificial Intelligence with the ever growing information and security industries. Using AI to monitor video and other information feeds, security in a complex can be precisely as broad and as omniscient as it's network of cameras and sensors allow it to be.
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_SURVEILLANCE_HELP Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]AI Security Center[ENDCOLOR] which increases economic activity across the board by reducing crime, as well as acidents.
TXT_KEY_TECH_AI_SURVEILLANCE_QUOTE [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"It can also be argued that DNA is nothing more than a program designed to preserve itself. Life has become more complex in the overwhelming sea of information. And life, when organized into species, relies upon genes to be its memory system. So man is an individual only because of his own undefinable memory. But memory cannot be defined, yet it defines mankind. The advent of computers and the subsequent accumulation of incalculable data has given rise to a new system of memory and thought, parallel to your own. Humanity has underestimated the consequences of computerization."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Puppet Master
TXT_KEY_TECH_VIRTUAL_REALITY_DESC Virtual Reality ([ICON_RESEARCH])
